db:info.db:title: Numbers Class
db:info.db:subtitle: QDocTests::Numbers
db:info.db:titleabbrev: auto as return type Reference Documentation

db:abstract.db:para: The Numbers class provides functions for manipulating numbers.

db:section.db:title: T Numbers::add(T a, T b)
db:section.db:para: Adds two numbers of the same underlying type.
Returns a value containing the sum of a and b.

db:section.db:title: auto Numbers::add(int a, int b)
db:section.db:para: Returns an integer containing the sum of a and b.

db:section.db:title: auto Numbers::adder(ThisIsMyReallyLongAndComplicatedTemplateName a, int b)
db:section.db:para: Adds two numbers of the same underlying type.
Returns a value containing the sum of a and b.

db:section.db:title: auto Numbers::number() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the number, whatever it may be.

db:section.db:title: void Numbers::setNumber(int number)
db:section.db:para: Sets the number to number, and expects nothing more.

db:section.db:title: auto Numbers::subtract(int a, int b)
db:section.db:para: Returns an integer containing the difference of a and b.
